object.title: Poll post
object.description: This is a poll. There are three choices you can make.
object.embed:
<form action="" class="poll-form">
    
        <label class="checkbox">
            <input name="poll" type="radio" value="1">
            The first option
        </label>
    
        <label class="checkbox">
            <input name="poll" type="radio" value="2">
            The second option
        </label>
    
        <label class="checkbox">
            <input name="poll" type="radio" value="3">
            The third option
        </label>
    

    <button type="submit" class="btn btn-success btn-block" disabled>Submit</button>
    <input type='hidden' name='csrfmiddlewaretoken' value='UrjMFqIGLlGhbxWit5tgwsW2BHtXTzJltQHHsJJfrIY9BT78njPW9kui1asYXtAb' />
</form>
